title: Best of The Program | Guest: Giancarlo Sopo | 2/24/20
description:
Obama-era DOJ whistleblower Philip Haney was found dead over the weekend, reportedly by suicide. But Glenn knew Haney as a true patriot, a winter soldier, and a friend. And he doesn’t believe the "suicide" theory at all. A Salon article laid out democratic socialism’s goal to destroy capitalism and prepare for revolution. And coronavirus has hit Iran, South Korea, and Italy as the world prepares for a possible pandemic.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

content:encoded:
Obama-era DOJ whistleblower Philip Haney was found dead over the weekend, reportedly by suicide. But Glenn knew Haney as a true patriot, a winter soldier, and a friend. And he doesn’t believe the "suicide" theory at all. A Salon article laid out democratic socialism’s goal to destroy capitalism and prepare for revolution. And coronavirus has hit Iran, South Korea, and Italy as the world prepares for a possible pandemic.
